directions: In a small bowl stir together all ingredients until sugar is dissolved.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons Asian fish sauce (preferably nuoc mam)
1 garlic clove, forced through a garlic press
2 small thin fresh red or green Asian chilies (1 to 2 inches long) or serrano chilies, seeded and chopped fine (wear rubber gloves)
title: Nuoc Cham
